item.description:
We are taking our May Meetup outside this month to enjoy some of this beautiful weather. Karl & Nicole will be our German hosts, welcoming us to their home in Westborough where you will get the chance to enjoy a beautiful piece of German culture, from tasty German specialty foods,  to German traditional music, and fun-filled German conversations, singing and dancing.

 

Important Details: This Meetup will be limited to 20 participants, so please reply only if you know for sure that you will be able to come. The fee is $15.00 per person which covers the fine German food Karl & Nicole will be preparing for us. Please bring what your prefer to drink yourself. Sodas will be provided. You can pay the fee in cash or per check right at the event but you must be on the RSVP list to participate. No drop-ins. RSVPs must be received by May 18th. This event will take place rain or shine and it's adults only.
item.name: Mai Treffen Hosted by Karl & Nicole
